topic: Créer une app sur la sante comme myfitnesspal

sections.title: Idea
sections.content: Developing a health app similar to MyFitnessPal, which helps users track their daily nutrition intake and physical activity.

sections.title: Market Research
sections.content: Conducting research on the current market trends for health and fitness apps, competitors in the same domain, and understanding user preferences and pain points.

sections.title: Business Model
sections.content: Creating a freemium model where basic features are available for free, while advanced features like personalized meal plans and nutritionist consultations are offered as premium subscriptions.

sections.title: Customer Segments
content: People looking to lose or gain weight
General public interested in tracking their nutrition

sections.title: Marketing Plan
sections.content: Utilizing social media, influencers, content marketing, app store optimization, and targeted advertising to reach the target audience.

sections.title: Launch Plan
sections.content: Soft launch for beta testing, gathering user feedback, and making necessary improvements; followed by a full-scale launch with marketing campaigns and continuous updates based on user feedback.
